summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating the manufacture, transportation, storage, sale and serving of foods, confections, liquids and edibles and drinks of all kinds; regulating and requiring permits for the operation of food establishments; prescribing penalties; and repealing Ordinances Nos. 24027, 24535, 64941 and Sections 15, 16, 28, 32, 33, 34, 35, 36, 37, 38, 39, 45 and 46 of Ordinance No. 15957.
